name: Dice Roll (Ronia)
description:
Little game started on 2022 GMTK Jam. Just a little project used to reconnect with game development.

Roll your dices to get more punctuation than the CPU roll. But be careful, every round has a maximum number that you can not overpass. Choose wisely your dices to get a punctuation between opponent's roll value and the round maximum number.

 If you beat all the rounds you will be rewarded with a cool ending!!

Controls:

-'Z' to roll dices

-'Left mouse button' to choose your dices

-'Esc' to exit game

PS: the game has some minnor bugs that i'm not going to waste time in solving. Just in advice: if a dice is not correctly facing the floor it will not count to punctuation and if a dice end the roll on top of other dice the game will stop working. So good luck and have fun :)
